desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.
desc.thai: The Foreclosure Task Force bumps into Trinity student Hifumi at the Black Market. She came to buy a limited-edition Peroro plush, but was chased by a group of bullies. The task force steps in, and a fight ensues.

desc.zh_tw: 抵达黑市的對策委員會一行人遇上三一综合学园的学生，日步美。日步美是为了购买佩洛洛限定玩偶才来到黑市，但却被小流氓找碴，正在逃跑当中。對策委員會一行人为了阻止那群小流氓，于是便与他们打了起来。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.jp: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.thai: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.ko: After outrunning the Black Market Guard, the group begins to question their resolve. Hoshino persuades them to take only the documents they need. Later, Problem Solver discovers the piles of money that were left behind.
desc.zh_tw: 躲过黑市保镳追击,顺利逃脱的對策委員會一行人。他们看到额数惊人的现金，顿时陷入苦恼。但是很快就被星野说服，决定只带着部分需要文档逃跑。而他们留下的一捆捆现金，则被亞瑠和便利屋职员捡走。

desc.en: When confirming the situation, everyone is surprised to find out that the 100 million money was with them all the time. Serika and Nonomi wants to use them to pay the debt, but is opposed by Hoshino greatly. Hoshino says that the bottom lines could not be crossed. At last everyone agrees to take away the documents only.

desc.en: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.jp: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.thai: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.ko: The documents reveal the true mastermind: a mega-syndicate known as the Kaiser Corporation. Confronted with such a seemingly insurmountable societal evil, the dejected students of the Foreclosure Task Force call it a day.
desc.zh_tw: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，對策委員會一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 通过从暗黑银行带来的文档，对策委员会一行人得知所有事件的黑幕，就是大型企业<凯萨公司>。在包围学校的社会巨恶面前，学生们失去斗志后决定暂时解散。

desc.en: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.jp: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.

desc.ko: After a careful inspection on the records, they do find out the money was flowing into the bank, then is directly used to support the Helmet Gang. Everything shows that Kaiser Corporation seems to be plotting against Abydos.
desc.zh_tw: 众人经过对记录的详细检查，发现记录的确流向了黑市银行，并发现自己的款项被直接用于头盔团的支持工作。一切表明凯撒公司似乎对阿拜多斯图谋不轨。

desc.en: Someone purposes to get back to Gehenna, yet by Kayoko's careful analysis, that the existence of the Prefect Team, especially Hina, will make them impossible to win and therefore impractical to go back.

desc.zh_tw: 中间有人提出了回到格黑娜的选项，但佳世子谨慎分析了形势，认为由于有風紀委員會，尤其是阳奈的存在，他们几乎没有胜算，回去其实挺不实际的。

desc.en: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with the thought of using funds acquired by the Foreclosure Task Force to attack Abydos High School. To lift her spirits, Problem Solver takes her to get Shiba Seki ramen. Meanwhile, a man in a black suit appears before Hoshino with a clandestine proposal.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠用向對策委員會成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亞瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亞瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，阿露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的阿露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，亚瑠感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的亚瑠，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露用向对策委员会成员取得的钱攻击阿拜多斯高中。对此，爱露感到良心的谴责而苦恼不断。为了鼓励无精打采的爱露，便利屋职员们一同前往柴关拉面店。另一方面，身穿黑色西装的男人出现在星野面前，向她提出秘密交易。

desc.en: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.jp: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.thai: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.ko: Aru is worried all night about another attack against Abydos. Haruka already set the bombs in place. Mutsuki can't understand why Aru doesn't take the money first, and Aru says it is because of the concern on being interfering too much by the customer.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠一整晚对再战阿拜多斯一行人而担忧，遙香则布置好了炸弹。無月不解为什么亞瑠不先收钱办事，亞瑠则说是怕被客户干涉太多。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_tw: 星野离开了学校，去见了黑服。黑服重新提起了所谓提案，并声称会给她一个“无法拒绝的条件”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.jp: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.thai: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.ko: Unaware of Aru's true feelings, the Foreclosure Task Force blame Aru for the heinous atrocity she accidentally caused. Eventually, Aru ends up confronting the team, pretending to be the villain they believe she is.
desc.zh_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亞瑠。對策委員會的学生没明白亞瑠的内心就指责她。结果亞瑠真的模仿坏蛋与對策委員會对立。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的阿露。对策委员会的学生没明白阿露的内心就指责她。结果阿露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的亚瑠。对策委员会的学生没明白亚瑠的内心就指责她。结果亚瑠真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 无意中犯下惨无人道的暴行的爱露。对策委员会的学生没明白爱露的内心就指责她。结果爱露真的模仿坏蛋与对策委员会对立。

desc.en: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.jp: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.thai: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.ko: During the climax of the battle between Problem Solver and Foreclosure Task Force, the combatants are suddenly shelled from afar. Ayane announces that the cannons were fired by Gehenna Academy's Prefect Team.
desc.zh_tw: 就在便利屋和對策委員會的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。綾音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是歌赫娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在便利屋和对策委员会的战斗达到最高潮时，砲击突然从远方袭来。绫音说发动砲击的是格黑娜学园的风纪委员会。

desc.en: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.jp: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.thai: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.ko: Haruka blows up the restaurant at the confusing speech delivered by Aru, which even makes Mutsuki start blaming Aru. Upon arrival, the Foreclosure Task Force is even more furious when they discovered the evil doer. They starts the battle immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 因为亞瑠的失语使得遙香炸掉了拉面店，就连無月也开始生气了。對策委員會赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为阿露的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为亚瑠的失语使得遥香炸掉了拉面店，就连无月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为爱露的失语使得春香炸掉了拉面店，就连睦月也开始生气了。对策委员会赶到后发现是便利屋68，更加怒不可遏，遂直接开始了战斗。

desc.en: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.jp: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.thai: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.ko: Gehenna's Prefect Team declares their intent to arrest the members of Problem Solver 68. The Foreclosure Task Force prepares for battle, rebutting that Gehenna Academy has no authority to make such an arrest on Abydos territory.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而對策委員會学生却反驳说，其他学园的風紀委員會在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜風紀委員會针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与歌赫娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会表明，自己的目的是来抓便利屋的问题学生。然而对策委员会学生却反驳说，其他学园的风纪委员会在阿拜多斯高中自治区活动实属越权，以此与格黑娜风纪委员会针锋相对。

desc.en: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.jp: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.thai: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.ko: Despite being outnumbered, the Foreclosure Task Force is victorious with Sensei's guidance. After the battle, the senior administrator of Gehenna's Prefect Team, Ako, steps in to mediate. Meanwhile, Haruka hatches a conspiracy.
desc.zh_tw: 格黑娜風紀委員會虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的對策委員會学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜風紀委員會的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遙香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌赫娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，歌赫娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而遥香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 格黑娜风纪委员会虽然占有数量上的优势，结果还是不敌老师所指挥的对策委员会学生，最后以战败收场。战斗一结束，格黑娜风纪委员会的资深行政官亚子出面调解，而春香则趁机开始策划某种阴谋。

desc.en: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.jp: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.thai: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.ko: The Prefect Team takes down the Problem Solver 68 successfully, yet it arises the dissatisfaction of Abydos. As the other party is operating in Abydos without proper permission, such actions can be seen as ignoring authority. Everyone decides to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 風紀委員會成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 风纪委员会成功放倒了便利屋68一行人，但却引来了阿拜多斯一行人的不满。由于对方未经授权在阿拜多斯境内活动，有无视权限之疑，众人决定迎战。

desc.en: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.jp: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.thai: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.ko: Talks with Ako are unfruitful, leaving the situation as hostile as ever. The Foreclosure Task Force decides to team up with Problem Solver to take on the Prefect Team and their sizable forces.
desc.zh_tw: 由于和風紀委員會的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。對策委員會决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的風紀委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 由于和风纪委员会的亚子交涉不顺利，以至于最后充满敌对气息。对策委员会决定与便利屋一行人合作，对抗具有压倒性战力的风纪委员会。

desc.en: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.jp: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.thai: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.ko: The hard-fought battle was seemingly over until yet more members of the Prefect Team appeared. Just then, the head prefect, Hina, arrives and questions Ako about the entire series of events thus far.
desc.zh_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 好不容易结束了艰苦的战斗，但是风纪委员的数量又大为增加。那时，风纪委员长阳奈现身，针对此状况责问亚子。

desc.en: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.jp: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.thai: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.ko: Sensei suddenly makes an eye contact with Haruka. Haruka squeezes a smile and then leaves in a hurry. Sensei also pretends not paying any attention.
desc.zh_tw: 老师突然将视线与遙香的对上了。遙香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师突然将视线与遥香的对上了。遥香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师突然将视线与春香的对上了。春香对老师笑了一下，然后匆匆离开。老师也假装并无在意。

desc.en: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.jp: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.thai: Ako first apologizes for the attack launched by Prefect Team and hopes to transfer the Problem Solver 68 to them for further investigation, which is naturally rejected. Ayane argues with factual facts, yet Ako refuses to take a step back. She says "It's probably because you have Schale's Sensei at your side."
desc.zh_tw: 亚子首先为風紀委員會发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望對策委員會将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。綾音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏萊的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有夏莱的老师站在你们这边吧”。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子首先为风纪委员会发起的攻击道歉，随后表示希望对策委员会将便利屋68的处置交由他们进行，结果自然受到了拒绝。绫音据理力争，而亚子则并不让步，并表示“这大概是因为有沙勒的老师站在你们这边吧”。

desc.en: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.jp: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.thai: The negotiations ends badly and Ako decides to attack again. Yet the Prefect Team is suddenly assaulted by Haruka. Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.

Meanwhile, Kayoko begins to gradually expose Ako's deception: the way that leading much troops to trouble in another district is definitely not Hina's doings, but in fact Ako's; the target is actually Schale, and it will make sense to lead extra troops.
desc.zh_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而對策委員會突然受到遙香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏萊，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到遥香的攻击，同时佳世子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是夏莱，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 谈判破裂，亚子打算继续攻击。然而对策委员会突然受到春香的攻击，同时佳代子也开始逐步拆穿亚子的骗局：带大量兵力来其他自治区闹事绝非阳奈所为，实际上是亚子自己出兵；目标实际上是沙勒，所以带了额外兵力就在情理之中。

desc.en: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.jp: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.thai: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.ko: Being exposed, Ako launches another attack without further ado, and declares everyone her own plan: as the Eden Treaty going to be signed, the Prefect Team worry that such organization will interfere the signing (the intel itself comes from Trinity's Hifumi telling it to the Tea Party, which then was gotten on hand by Gehenna). As planned, they will first put Sensei under house arrest and then deal with Problem Solver 68.
desc.zh_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，風紀委員會担心夏萊这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被歌赫娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在歌赫娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心夏莱这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日步美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子被拆穿后立刻发起了攻击，并向所有人直接宣告了自己的计划：由于伊甸条约签署在即，风纪委员会担心沙勒这样的组织会干涉条约签署（这一情报来源于三一的日富美将内容给了茶会，而茶会的情报又被格黑娜拿到手了），于是便打算先将老师软禁在格黑娜，顺带处理便利屋68。

desc.en: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.
desc.jp: Kayoko hoped Aru can leave as soon as possible, but Aru not only says that she will fight till the end, but also Abydos requests for cooperation as well. Seeing the situation, Ako gives an official command for commercing the battle.

desc.zh_tw: 佳世子希望亞瑠尽快离开，但亞瑠不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 佳代子希望阿露尽快离开，但阿露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 佳代子希望爱露尽快离开，但爱露不仅表示要战斗到底，阿拜多斯一行人也主动请求与他们合作。见此情形，亚子正式下达了战斗命令。

desc.en: Ako is well aware of the risks but decides to proceed anyways. At this moment Hina connects onto the comm. Ako originally wants to take "on patrol" as an excuse, but Hina has already understood most of it and comes out in person.

desc.en: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Having heard Ako's story, Hina promptly apologizes for the Prefect Team overstepping their bounds. While commanding her forces to pull out, Hina subtly informs Sensei that the Kaiser Corporation is up to something in the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用風紀委員會一事，老实地向對策委員會道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈听闻来龙去脉后，对于亚子擅自动用风纪委员会一事，老实地向对策委员会道歉。另外在撤兵的同时，阳奈悄悄地给老师情报，告诉老师凯萨在阿拜多斯沙漠做些什么事。

desc.en: Ako tries to explain that she is fighting against Problem Solver 68, but the latter has been long gone. Hina gets even angrier but then expresses her understanding, yet she still points out that such political issues should be left to the Pandemonium Society. Hina says Ako will be punished with confinement.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子试图解释自己是在和便利屋68作战，但转眼间后者便消失不见。阳奈的脸越来越黑，不过随后表示理解，但仍然指出此类政治问题应交由万魔殿进行处理。阳奈表示将处以亚子紧闭处分。

desc.en: Hina says the conflict is indeed their wrong doings, but it's also true that they had interfered with Gehenna's official duties. The Abydos remain hostile, though. At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. Hina mentions "that incident" and suddenly realizes something.

At this moment Ayane mentions Hoshino, and Hoshino appears just on time. Hina exchanges a few words with Hoshino and expresses her surprise at Hoshino's dramatic character change. desc.zh_tw: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了格黑娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时綾音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阳奈表示冲突确实是自己人不对，但干涉了歌赫娜的公务却也是事实。众人表示不会轻易放过。就在这时绫音提起了星野，而星野也随叫随到。阳奈与星野寒暄了几句，对星野性格变化之大表示惊讶。阳奈提到了“那次事件”，随后突然意识到了什么。

desc.en: Being late on site, Hoshino is confused about what happened. Everyone decides to discuss it tomorrow in classroom and returns early. Shiroko notices that Hina seems to have said something to Sensei, and Sensei says that they will know it by tomorrow.

desc.en: Back at the club room, everyone goes over what had happened. Ayane and Serika do some digging into administrative documents and tell the group that the majority of the Abydos district's land has been transfered to the Kaiser Corporation.

desc.zh_tw: 大伙们再次到社团室集合整理情况。綾音和茜香翻找行政文档，把阿拜多斯的自治区大部分都落入凯萨之手的事告诉大家。

desc.en: Sensei meets Nonomi at the school gate and Nonomi asks the physical conditions of Master Shiba. Sensei says he is in good conditions, but Nonomi guesses it right that there might be some other problems. Nonomi purposes to go back to the classroom and expresses her appreciation for Sensei's help these days. Nonomi hopes that Sensei could continue going with them and Sensei assures.

desc.zh_tw: 老师在校门口遇到了野乃美，询问了下柴大将的身体情况。老师表示他身体情况不错，但被野乃美猜出大概还有其他问题。野乃美提议先回教室，并表达了对老师这些天来处理事情得感激之情，希望老师能够继续与他们走下去。老师表示了肯定。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Shiroko seems to be questioning Hoshino seriously, but Hoshino pretends to know nothing. Nonomi and Sensei break into the room, yet none of them mentions anything - only "something with Hoshino". Nonomi says there's nothing should be hid between the Task Force, and Hoshino is forced to admit that it was only "Shiroko scolding her for sleeping too much". Despite that, Nonomi senses dishonest in it.

desc.zh_tw: 白子似乎在对星野进行着严肃的质问，但星野一问三不知。野乃美和老师闻声赶到，但两人之字不提，只是表示“与星野有些事而已”。野乃美表示對策委員會间可没有什么好隐藏的，星野于是不得不表示“只是自己睡午觉太多而被白子骂了”而已。尽管如此，野乃美还是看出了其中的不真诚。

desc.en: Serika and Ayane has obtained a map of land ownership throughout Abydos and confirmed an emergency. Initially, most of them, including Hoshino, thought that Abydos is obviously owned by the school; yet based on the transaction records, the most of the land has long been owned by the Kaiser Group.

desc.zh_tw: 茜香和綾音拿到了阿拜多斯全境的土地所有权地图，表示确认了一个紧急情况。起初，包括星野在内的大多数人都认为阿拜多斯当然由学校所有，但从交易记录上来看，显然大多数土地早已由凯撒集团所有。

desc.en: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.
desc.jp: Hoshino recounts history to the Foreclosure Task Force. It's likely the now-defunct Abydos Student Council tried to repay its debts until the land was eventually repossessed by the Kaiser Corporation. Sensei suggests following Hina's hint and to go to the Abydos Desert.

desc.zh_tw: 對策委員會从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对策委员会从星野口中听说昔日往事。现在推测，消失的阿拜多斯学生会为了偿还债务，结果但却连土地都被凯萨抢走了。老师依照从阳奈那里听说的，提议前往阿拜多斯沙漠。

desc.en: The truth is, most of the land in Abydos has been owned by Kaiser Corporation (Kaiser Construction to be exact). Not only is everyone confused about the reason behind it, but also how it was done. Hoshino and Ayane says that these transactions should only be made by the people from the former student union, as they had the highest authority.

desc.zh_tw: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和綾音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 事实是，阿拜多斯的大多数土地均已归属于凯撒集团（凯撒建设）。众人不仅对为何要夺走这么多土地表示疑问，也不解究竟是怎么办到的。星野和绫音表示，由于学生会有学校的最高权限，因而这些交易应都是由前学生会的人所做。

昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Hoshino describes the situation back then, and in a nutshell, it was in chaos. The desertification was extremely serious at then, and the school was forced to relocate for several times. Not only did the student number dropping fast, teachers nowhere to find, but also most of the student union had resigned. There was only one left, but that person was unreliable, just like Hoshino had a bad temper at then, according to Hoshino. Everyone is shocked by the fact. Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.

Shiroko says Hoshino has no need to belittle herself, saying that she is a responsible president.
desc.zh_tw: 星野阐述了当时情况，总结起来十分混乱。当时荒漠化已经非常严重，学校被迫搬迁数次。不仅学生只剩下两位数、教职工基本不存在导致教学停止，学生会的人也大多已经辞职，只剩下另外一位前辈。但星野表示那位前辈也不靠谱，而她那时性格也并不怎样。众人对此表示惊异。白字表示星野没有必要这么贬低自己，表示她是个很有责任感的会长。

desc.en: Everyone starts to discuss why the school would have decided to sell the land to Kaiser. Everyone thinks it is because of the debts. However, due to the low selling prices, it was no use after all. Sensei suddenly notices that, both the lender and buyer are all Kaiser, and Abydos is in fact in a trap, whose goal might actually be the land of Abydos. Serika can't understand why the student union would do such things, but Hoshino says that people would certainly do such if they are cornered.

desc.zh_tw: 大家开始讨论学校究竟为什么要把土地卖给凯撒集团。大家普遍认为是债款已经堆积过多导致，但由于出售价格过低，实际上也没有什么用。这时老师突然注意到，贷款方和购买方似乎都是凯撒集团，阿拜多斯实际上中了凯撒集团的圈套，后者目标很可能是阿拜多斯的土地。茜香无法理解学生会为什么会做出这样的决定，但星野则表示，走投无路的人们的确会做出这样的事。

desc.en: Before leaving, Shiroko stops Sensei. In a classroom, Shiroko shows Sensei the thing she found in Hoshino's bag: a resignation application, with the name "Takanashi Hoshino". Sensei asks why Shiroko would do so, and Shiroko says it was because she thought that recently, Hoshino seems to be behaving particularly strange, and there must be something hidden.

desc.zh_tw: 走之前，白子叫住了老师。在一间教室里，白子向老师展示了从星野书包中找到的东西：退社信，對策委員會小鸟游星野。老师问白子为什么会这么做，白子则表示是因为他觉得星野最近的行为非常怪异，之中一定有不可告人的东西。

desc.en: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.
desc.jp: The Kaiser board member reveals their ambitions to find a massive treasure buried somewhere in Abydos. Then, using the Foreclosure Task Force's debt as leverage, the creditor forces them to back down. Hoshino calls for a retreat to the chagrin of the other task force members.

desc.zh_tw: 凯萨的干部表明自己在找寻埋在阿拜多斯某处的宝物的野心，而且还利用债券压迫對策委員會。星野带着气愤的對策委員會一行人暂时撤退。

desc.en: Ako talked big and claimed that she could write 1000 pages, but didn't expect Hina would actually be doing so. During the break, Ako asks Hina whether she knew about Hoshino. Hina says it's the first time for her to meet her, and discloses that she's listed as a potential threat by Gehenna's Intelligence Agency for her ability; but she also agreed with Ako that Hoshino does seem to be completely different in these two years. Hina also mentions about the battle at then, believing that if Ako continued combating, they could sustain a great loss because of Schale's assistance. She criticizes Ako for being too impulsive.

desc.zh_tw: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏萊等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被歌赫娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在夏莱等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 亚子说大话，称自己能写1000页，结果阳奈真的按她说的做了。间隙，亚子询问阳奈是否对星野知情。阳奈表示自己也是第一次见她，并说她曾经因能力被格黑娜情报机构列为潜在威胁对象；但又同意亚子的看法，星野这两年来的确判若两人。阳奈之后又提到了当时的战斗，认为如果继续战斗，在沙勒等的支援下，很可能会损失惨重，批评亚子过于冲动。

desc.en: Kaiser Director introduces himself to everyone, which is immediately got under fire. But the director doesn't care, and says that given the current situation, it is true that the Foreclosure Task Force has invaded their own private lands. He also says that the troops are all for searching treasures beneath Abydos, not for invading Abydos High School. Nobody is convinced, and director demonstrates just how easy it would be for him to "actually sabotage Abydos".

desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事向各位介绍了自己的身份。众人对PMC理事开始口诛笔伐，但后者并不在乎。就事论事，對策委員會一行人目前是侵犯了他们的私有土地，并大方地指出自己是为了寻找阿拜多斯地底下的某个宝贝，而这些兵力也绝非为了入侵阿拜多斯。众人很不相信，理事于是便现场演示了“如何真正处置阿拜多斯”。

desc.en: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.

But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.thai: Kaiser Director makes a call and says that Abydos High School's credit is at all-time low, and the interest rate will be raised 30 times higher. At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.

At the club room, Ayane answers the call and is greatly shocked. Kaiser Director also says that they would first need to pay a deposit in advance to prove their repayment ability. But that could never be achieved - and so, the director advises them to give up or drop out the school, or simply transfer to another one. No one is willing to step a step back. Hoshino says that it's useless to argue here and suggests to leave first.
desc.zh_tw: 凯撒理事打了个电话，表示阿拜多斯学校的信用已降到最低，并上调了30倍利率。在社团室的綾音收到了来电，大受震撼。凯撒理事表示，为了证明还款能力，他们必须先提前交纳一笔保证金，但那根本不可能做到——理事此时便提出让他们放弃学校，进行退学或转学。众人拒不后退。星野表示在这里争论没有用，提议先行离开。

desc.en: After sending her enraged underclassmen home, Hoshino reveals to Sensei the secret deal she was offered by the man in the black suit. Sensei tries to console her, but the next day finds no trace of Hoshino, save for her resignation letter.

desc.zh_tw: 把气愤的学妹们送回家后，星野把身穿黑西装的男人曾向自己提出秘密交易的事告诉老师。虽然老师替星野打气加油，但隔天星野却留下自动退学书消失踪影。

desc.en: Hoshino remembers the days with that former Student Union president. That president held a positive view of the future and believed that the future of Abydos would not be just like that. She also gifted a poster of the old festival to Hoshino. But Hoshino interrupted her and denied her, ripping apart the poster at hand.

desc.zh_tw: 星野记起了和以前那位学生会会长的事情。那位会长对未来的一切充满希望，认定阿拜多斯的未来并非如此，还将以前庆典的一张海报给了星野。但星野打断并否定了她，还撕烂了手中的海报。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.

desc.en: Yume is the president of the former Abydos Student Council. She had worked together with Hoshino and holds a positive view of the future (as Hoshino recalls). Her image only appeared once in a photo taken with Hoshino. Currently there's no more information about her, but some suspect that she was dead, as seen in the Chapter 1 and the Volume Final.

desc.zh_tw: 夢是阿拜多斯前學生會的主席。她曾與星野一起工作，對未來抱有正面的想法（如星野所述）。她本人只在一張與星野一起拍的合照上出現過。當前沒有更多關於她的訊息，但有些人認為她可能已經死了，如在第一篇和最終篇中所呈現的一樣。

desc.en: Everyone still can't understand what PMC is looking for; after all, high value stuff like oils has long been proved to be non-existed. Shiroko says she wanted to investigate it first, but gets caught by Ayane to be having the previous idea. Hoshino advises everyone to calm down and return to take rests first.

desc.zh_tw: 众人还是不理解PMC究竟在找什么，毕竟石油之类的高价值物品已被探明并不存在。白子想先去调查一下，但被綾音识出可能实为去抢银行，遭到阻止。星野让大家冷静下来，先行回去休息。

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei waits into the night. Hoshino sends Shiroko away for "being too tired". Sensei remains in the classroom and takes out Hoshino's resignation application. Hoshino tries to move the problem onto Shiroko, but Sensei didn't let go. Hoshino agrees to talk about the situation, but first she would like to be out at the corridors.

desc.zh_tw: 白子和老师等到很晚才离开。星野因疲劳打发走了白子，但老师并未离开。老师拿出了星野的退社信，星野想把问题转移到白子上，但老师紧追不放。星野同意向老师讲述情况，但得出去到走廊上。

desc.en: The sandstorm brings much dust into the school corridors. Hoshino coughs a few times and apologizes for the lack of manpower. Hoshino then mutters a few words. Sensei says that Hoshino seems to be really liking Abydos, but gets denied by the latter. Then, Hoshino tells Sensei about the "deal".

desc.zh_tw: 因为风沙太大，积尘严重，星野咳了几声，表示学校人手实在不够。星野之后又嘀咕了几句。老师说星野看上去非常喜欢阿拜多斯，后者则表示了否定。之后，星野向老师讲出了那个“请求”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Hoshino suspects that PMC (especially the Black Suit) seems to be hiring some professionals. Hoshino says that she has never seen anyone like him in Kivotos, and it appears to her that even Kaiser Director fears him as well. As for the resignation application, Hoshino says it is nothing serious and rips it apart in front of Sensei. Hoshino says she'll made it clear for everyone, but also feels that it is the only option to accept that deal. Before leaving, Sensei makes a promise to Hoshino that he will eventually come up with solutions.

desc.zh_tw: 星野推测PMC（尤其是黑服）似乎是在招募一些能手。星野表示她从没在基沃托斯见过他那样的人，而且似乎凯撒集团的理事也很怕他。至于退社信，星野表示只是脑袋一时糊涂，在老师面前撕掉了它。星野还表示明天会和大家说清楚，但又觉得接受那个请求似乎唯一无二。星野走前，老师承诺会想出解决方案。

desc.zh_tw: 凯萨理事对这意想不到的状况非常气愤。而老师则指挥對策委員會和便利屋学生对抗PMC士兵。

desc.en: The director is both shocked and angry to see that the Problem Solver 68 betrayed them, but the latter insults them back. Sensei confronts the director, demanding that Hoshino be returned. The director doesn't step back. Everyone is forced to engage the enemies.

desc.en: The CEO of the PMC cooperation and its subsidiaries, one of the main villain in Blue Archive. He appeared in the 1st and Final volumes. His main goal is to bring Kivotos under his rules. He had cooperated with the Black Suit before.

desc.zh_tw: 是PMC公司及其各個子公司的CEO，蔚藍檔案中的主要反派之一。在第一篇與最終章中均有出現，主要目標是將基沃託斯納入自己的手下統治；曾與黑色西服人合作過。

desc.zh_tw: 晚上，老师来到了一幢大楼前。在顶层办公室，老师遇到了黑服。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.jp: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.thai: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.ko: Midori and Momoi are searching the ruins for G.BIBLE, the holy grail of game development. Unfortunately, hostile robots force them to retreat to the abandoned factory.
desc.zh_tw: 綠和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 绿和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 绿和桃井想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 绿和桃想在废墟找到，记载着制作出最佳游戏的秘诀的圣经<G.Bible>，不料却被一群敌对机器人追赶，因而逃往废弃工厂。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.

Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.

As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.ko: Momoi and Midori started their adventure while dodging the weird robots. Momoi talked about some things about the ruins and told Sensei what G.BIBLE truly is - a game-making tutorial book written by one ancient legendary game maker. As the talk went delightfully, the were discovered by the robots, and Momoi decided to avoid them by going into a nearby abandoned factory.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井与綠开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃井稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃井随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井与绿开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃井稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃井随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井与绿开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃井稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃井随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃与绿开始在废墟里探险，三人共同躲避着奇怪的机器人。期间桃稍微讲了一些关于废墟的事情，向老师说明了《G.BIBLE》为何——一本由以前的传奇制作人写下的游戏制作书籍。就在众人在聊的欢时，他们被机器人发现，桃随后决定前往附近的一所废弃工厂回避。

desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井为了阻止遊戲開發部被废社，于是便把愛麗絲带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.thai: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.ko: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.zh_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.thai: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的愛麗絲，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。綠可怜愛麗絲，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，愛麗絲因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井将愛麗絲带回到社团活动室，綠非常惊诧。愛麗絲因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让愛麗絲伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

name.jp: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun
name.thai: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun
name.ko: Much Too Big to Be Called a Gun

desc.en: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department heads to the Engineering Department to get Aris a firearm. Aris ends up picking a railgun meant to be attached to an intergalactic battleship. The Engineering Department challenges Aris to a fight to test her abilities.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部学生为了取得能让愛麗絲使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程師部>。愛麗絲在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程師部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千禧年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程师部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程师部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部学生为了取得能让爱丽丝使用的枪支,便前往 千年学园的<工程部>。爱丽丝在那里选择了宇宙战舰用的轨道炮。工程部为了测试她的能力而向她挑战。

desc.en: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.jp: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.thai: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.ko: Aris skillfully uses the railgun to fend off the Engineering Department members, despite never having held such a weapon before. Utaha, the president of the Engineering Department, begins to become suspicious of Aris' unusual physical prowess.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程師部。工程師部的部长詠葉见状，便害怕起愛麗絲卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程师部。工程师部的部长咏叶见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝熟练地使用从没碰过的轨道炮,压制了工程部。工程部的部长歌原见状，便害怕起爱丽丝卓越的身体素质。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.jp: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.thai: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.ko: Utaha and others welcomed them, and Hibiki took the initiative to choose weapons for Aris. But Aris soon put her attention onto a railgun, which was then introduced by Kotori. She mentioned that the development was terminated due to funding issues. All of the Engineering Department thought Aris couldn't lift it up, but Aris had not only lifted it, but also shot a hole on the club room; as a last resort, the Engineering Department challenged the Game Development Department, that they could take it away if they won them.
desc.zh_tw: 詠葉等工程師部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。響主动提出要为愛麗絲找武器，但愛麗絲很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亞都梨主动为愛麗絲介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程師部众人本以为愛麗絲无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程師部决定测试遊戲開發部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。柯托莉主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 咏叶等工程师部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。亚都梨主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程师部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程师部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 歌原等工程部的学生欢迎了开发部一行人。响主动提出要为爱丽丝找武器，但爱丽丝很快把注意力放到了一门轨道炮上。琴里主动为爱丽丝介绍了这门杰作，提到由于资金问题这门大炮的研发已经终止。工程部众人本以为爱丽丝无法举起它，但后者不仅拿起了它，还不小心给房顶开了个洞；不得已，工程部决定测试游戏开发部众人的能力，达标后才能拿走。

desc.en: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.jp: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.

desc.ko: In order to read the G.BIBLE, the Game Development Department needs to decrypt the password. To do so, they reach out to Veritas. Maki tells them they'll need the Mirror that was confiscated by the Student Council. To retrieve it, they'll need to get into the contraband storage guarded by the Maid Club.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<貝里塔斯>咨询。真紀回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理社>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部为了解读暗号阅览<G.Bible>而向<真理会>咨询。真纪回答说，如果想解读暗号，需要有被学生会扣押的骇客工具<镜子>。一行人为了拿回<镜子>，便前往由女仆部看守的学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.jp: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.thai: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.ko: Hare from Veritas brought a bad news to everyone: Momoi's game saves could not be recovered. Momoi cried out after hearing this. Maki, by analyzing the file's metadata, confirmed its genuity, but was unable to crack the password.
desc.zh_tw: 貝里塔斯的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真紀通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真理社的晴首先为大家带来了坏消息：桃井的游戏存档不可恢复，桃井听到立刻哭了起来。不过，真纪通过分析文件元数据，确认了文件的真实性，但却无法破解密码。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.
desc.jp: For Maki's reference, she thought that it is possible if they were just extracting the encrypted files rather than cracking the password. Yet a tool specifically designed to do so, called "Mirror", was confiscated by the Seminar recently. As a tool created by the president, Veritas intended to retrieve it back, which made an unexpected collision with the GDD. As a result, they purposed to raid Millennium's Seminar.

desc.zh_tw: 真紀认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，貝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，真理社也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千禧年学生会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 真纪认为，如果能直接提取出加密文件而不是破解密码，应该还能行得通。然而一款正是照此设计的工具“镜子”却被学生会没收。因为是部长制作的工具，贝里塔斯也打算将其取回——这与开发部众人不谋而合，于是他们便提出要突袭千年学生会。

desc.en: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.jp: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.thai: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.ko: Momoi still held her concern on whether participating or not, but Midori had already decided it: the GDD is an important place for everyone to gather and laugh, and she wanted to protect all of this. Having played more than 40 RPG games, Aris concluded that it's nothing more important than friends alongside in an adventure. Hare appreciated that and wanted Sensei to ask the Engineering Department to join them as well.
desc.zh_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但綠已经决定：遊戲開發部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。愛麗絲从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程師部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 桃井还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程师部一起行动。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃还对是否参与有所顾忌，但绿已经决定：游戏开发部，是大家在一起的重要地方，她想要保护这一切。爱丽丝从玩过的四十多款RPG中得出结论，冒险路上最重要的是同行的伙伴。晴表示同意，并希望老师能够去找工程部一起行动。

desc.en: Aris took the role as forceful breakthrough girl, but was arrested at last. Akane expressed her liking towards Aris. Yuuka suddenly realized the trap in it, and enjoined the subordinate to replace the security system with the ones that were not from the Engineering Department.

desc.en: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.
desc.jp: During the meeting held two hours ago, Hare mentioned that the only way to access the Contraband Room would be the lifts. Yet both the lifts and the doors on the top floor should only be verified by fingerprints, and failed to verify that would also trigger multiple mechanisms. In order to break through the security system, Hibiki proposed to disable the system with EMP for a while, and by that means the Veritas would be able to hack in.

desc.zh_tw: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，響提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时貝里塔斯即可开始骇入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 两小时前的作战会议中，晴提到到达保管所的地方唯有通过电梯到达，然而电梯和顶楼各区域的门只能通过指纹验证，且验证失败还会触发多种机关。为了突破安全系统，响提出用EMP手雷瘫痪所有系统，到时真理社即可开始骇入。

desc.en: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.jp: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.thai: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.ko: Akane thought herself would be meeting Momoi and Midori, which was then turned out to be Maki and Kotori of the Engineering Department. Akane requested to confirm the status, and it was then all of them realized that the surveillance network had been hacked.
desc.zh_tw: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和綠，实际上却是工程師部的真紀与亞都梨。朱音向優香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程部的真纪与柯托莉。茜向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音以为碰见了桃井和绿，实际上却是工程师部的真纪与亚都梨。朱音向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜以为碰见了桃和绿，实际上却是工程部的真纪与琴里。茜向优香请求确认监控状态，这时大家才意识到监控已被骇入。

desc.en: Momoi and Midori was at the lift, while Akane and others were locked up together due to the unmatched fingerprints. Yuuka was too late to realize the trap set by Aris. Momoi, Midori and Sensei arrived at the floor and successfully unlocked with their own fingerprints, yet they still met other Seminar members.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井和綠到达了电梯前，与此同时朱音等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时優香才意识到愛麗絲的问题，而桃井、綠与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃井、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 桃和绿到达了电梯前，与此同时茜等人却因指纹不符而被一同关了起来。这时优香才意识到爱丽丝的问题，而桃、绿与老师三人已经到达顶楼，并顺利用指纹开锁，但还是遇到了学生会成员。

desc.en: Though the door stayed closed and unable to contact Asuna, Akane received a message from another partner - Karin. She confirmed that the Game Development Department members had already within the shooting range.

desc.zh_tw: 闸门虽无法打开，也联系不上明日奈，但这时朱音收到了另一位同伴的消息——花凛确认，遊戲開發部成员已进入射击范围。

desc.en: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department shakes off the Maid Club's sniper, Karin, with President Utaha's help. However, shortly after, they are confronted by another maid: Asuna.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人在詠葉部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人在咏叶部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人在歌原部长的帮助下，成功甩开女仆部狙击手花凛，但另一名女仆部成员明日奈却出现在一行人面前。

desc.en: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.jp: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.thai: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.ko: When Momoi thought they were away from the threats, a single sniping bullet fired towards them. Midori realized it was Karin's doing. On the roof, as Karin prepared for the next shot, the Engineering Department came just in time and disturbed the plan. Momoi and others continued to advance immediately.
desc.zh_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，綠立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程師部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 就在桃井一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程师部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃井等人立刻继续前进。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 就在桃一行人以为已经逃离了威胁后，一发狙击子弹向他们飞来，绿立刻意识到是狙击手花凛所为。在楼顶上，就在花凛准备继续下一发时，工程部及时阻止并扰乱了计划。桃等人立刻继续前进。

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.

desc.thai: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.ko: Having taken too long, Akane and Karin escape their bonds, an event spelling disaster for the Game Development Department's mission. Just then, Aris came to the rescue and succeeded in infiltrating the Student Council's contraband storage room.
desc.zh_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，遊戲開發部又再次陷入危机。这时，愛麗絲及时现身解救遊戲開發部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 因为耽误到时间的关系，朱音和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 因为耽误到时间的关系，茜和花凛也从封锁中解放出来。就这样，游戏开发部又再次陷入危机。这时，爱丽丝及时现身解救游戏开发部，让一行人成功进入学生会扣押品保管所。

desc.en: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.jp: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.thai: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.ko: Yuuka put the confiscated robots into the battle. Asuna was tough to deal with. The Engineering Department failed to suppress the sniper Karin. Akane was on her way. At the seemingly hopeless moment, the Game Development Department remembered the meeting.
desc.zh_tw: 優香命令将收缴来的机器人加入战场，明日奈的战力也绝非等闲之辈，工程師部无力压制狙击手花凛，朱音也正在赶来。在似乎无望之际，众人想起了之前会议的内容。

desc.en: Everyone agreed that the plan itself tolerates zero failure, so a backup plan is required. After the power failure, Aris sensed that the time was ripe. She escaped the self-reflection room and headed to the Contraband Room.

desc.en: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.
desc.jp: Yuuka and others finally arrived and announced that the GDD would be confined or suspended. Aris appeared suddenly and got rid of the barriers with Sword of Light; Karin was re-suppressed as well. Aris mentioned that, in every RPG games she had played, the hero will never abandon friends. Encouraged, everyone started to engage.

desc.zh_tw: 優香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把遊戲開發部关禁闭的处分。愛麗絲突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。愛麗絲特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 优香等人终于到齐，宣布了要把游戏开发部关禁闭的处分。爱丽丝突然出现，以光之剑破除了障碍；花凛也被重新压制。爱丽丝特别提到，在所有RPG游戏中，勇者是从来不会放弃同伴的。受到鼓励的众人开始迎战。

desc.en: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.thai: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.ko: The Game Development Department is able retrieve the Mirror, but comes face-to-face with the Maid Club's president Neru in the contraband storage room. Thanks to Yuzu's quick thinking, the group is able to trick Neru and safely return to their club room.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长寧瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过寧瑠，遊戲開發部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长尼禄。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过尼禄，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长宁瑠。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过宁瑠，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人顺利取得<镜子>之后，却在扣押品保管所遭遇女仆部的部长妮露。多亏柚子急中生智成功骗过妮露，游戏开发部才得以顺利返回社团活动室。

desc.en: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.jp: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.thai: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.ko: The three arrived at the Contraband Room but found Neru was back. Panicking, they made a sound and attracted Neru. Fortunately, Yuzu came to rescue just in time and deceived Neru into leaving.
desc.zh_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现寧瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了寧瑠使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现尼禄回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了尼禄使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现宁瑠回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了宁瑠使其离开。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 三人成功到达了保管室，却意外发现妮露回来了。惊慌失措的众人不小心发出了声音引起注意，幸好柚子及时到来，骗过了妮露使其离开。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)

desc.zh_tw: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
